name: Brandon's Better Conan: SafeZones
description:
Latest Version 0.6.8

This mod contains an admin spawnable "SafeZone" placabe which protects players, thralls, and placables within them from siege damage , blocks projectiles from the outside, and banishes avatars that come into contact with it.

This mod is stable, but a work in progress. Currently the placeable Safe Zone is a 50x sized Sphere that is essentially a permanent God Bubble - Plus. More work needs to be done to make a UI through which an admin can adjust the zone at runtime.

Future Roadmap: 
1. Make a configuration UI for the zone with the following options:
-Protect Players
-Protect Thralls in the volume
-Protect Buildings in the volume
-Allow Drowning in the volume
-Allow Fall Damage in the volume

2. Add new options for hiding or changing the safe zone's visuals. Add these to the config GUI.

Known Issues:
1. God Mode state gets turned off every 30 seconds while using this mod. (0.6.4) Will be fixed in a new update coming ASAP.
changeNote: -Resolved an issue where the ModController's anti-cheat safety check was accidentally disabling God mode on admins outside of the safe zone.
author: Brandon Snider (The 7th Crest)
